locations.name: Dubrovnik
locations.description: A historic city known for its magnificent medieval walls, limestone streets within the Old Town, and stunning Adriatic views.

locations.name: Hvar
locations.description: Croatia's sunniest island, famed for its sophisticated charm, vibrant harbour, beautiful beaches, and nearby Pakleni Islands.

locations.name: Split
locations.description: A major coastal city built around the ancient Roman Diocletian's Palace (UNESCO World Heritage site), featuring a bustling Riva promenade and historic alleyways.
